page.description: Pseduo-function used to apply the filter for a Grid Component to a Report.

discussion.p: The *[xb:currentGridFilter()]* function is a pseudo-function that can be used to apply the current filter for a Grid Component to a Report. This allows you to generate a report based on the records shown in a Grid Component.
To apply a Grid's order expression to a report, use the [currentGridOrder()] pseudo-function.
